LanguageData.Plant_USStinkroot.label: Stinkroot
LanguageData.Plant_USStinkroot.description: A genetically modified flower that gives off an awful smell. This flower uses a toxic gas defence mechanism in an attempt to defend it's territory.
LanguageData.USStinkrootLeaves.label: Stinkroot leaves
LanguageData.USStinkrootLeaves.description: Harvested leaves of the stinkroot flower. These leaves are extremely toxic.
LanguageData.Gas_USStinkroot.label: Stinkroot Gas
